title: Conferences/Workshops
body:
Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners.
Table of Contents  May 2021 June 2021 July 2021 September 2021 October 2021 November 2021 December 2021 Missing any conference?  May 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Kafka Summit Europe 2021 11, 12 May 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    AWS Summit India Online 2021 Postponed Register Virtual (Free) IST    Dockercon 2021 27 May 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST     June 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     JS Nation Live 18, 19 June 2021 Register Virtual (Chargeable) CEST     July 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Sodacon 2021 13, 14 July 2021 Register Virtual (Free till June 15) PST     September 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Spring One 2021 1, 2 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Kafka Summit Americas 2021 14, 15 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST     October 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     VM World 2021 5-7 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Kubecon North America 2021. 12-15 Oct 2021 Register Los Angeles PST    All Things Open 2021 18, 19 Oct 2021 Regiser Free + In-person EST    Dashcon 2021 26, 27 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST     November 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     ISTA 2021 18 Nov 2021 Register Virtual      December 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Gophercon 2021 5-8 Dec 2021 Register  PST     Missing any conference Do raise a pull request to this repo to add/update conference information.
